data.title: Pandya Name Meaning in Hindi & English, Rashi, Nakshatra, Origin, Lucky Number
data.meta_description: Pandya is a Hindu baby boy name. Its meaning is "South Indian Dynasty". Pandya name origin is Hindi. Write Pandya in Hindi : पंड्या, And Numerology (Lucky number) is 7, Syllables is 2.5, Rashi is Kanya (P, TTHH), Nakshatra is Uttara phalguni (TO, PA, PI)., Baby names meaning in Urdu, Hindi

Pandya Name Numerology And Personality

Pandya has the numerology 2. People with numerology 2 are known to be one of the most cooperative and that is because they are very quick to adapt to whatever environment they choose to be in. They do not keep overthinking everything rather they start to work immediately.

The gender of this Pandya is Boy these people are also very inclusive of everyone which makes them considering and they do not let the people around them feel left out. They are always very compassionate and affectionate towards everyone and that is why they are heart of any get together. The meaning of this Pandya is South indian dynasty.

These people are always the first ones to mediate whenever something serious occurs and they are also very good at partnering with people which definitely makes them one a kind.
